stories.text:
Hi there! We're looking for a great hosted website service for an early stage startup that covers:

- Nice landing page

- Mobile friendly / lightweight

- Has a blog engine built in (markdown is ok)

- Easy to use (after setup) by non-developers

- SEO / discoverability built in

- Ideally cheap/near-free

What are the reliable and good options out there these days?
stories.title: Ask HN: Best website-as-a-service tool for early stage startup?
Mountain lion kittens found under picnic table in California
Better.com CEO to Take Time Off After Zoom Firings
Updated Santa Clara Principles are out

stories.text:
Would you join? $0.

Reddit and other places are filled with charlatans. I hate them. Difficult to go through the noise to find meaningful advice.

And so I'm making a newsletter of curated tweets on growing your company from vetted, legit founders and marketers from Twitter - at zero cost to you.

Thoughts?
stories.title: Should I? Newsletter for startup growth, $0
The hand-cranked calculator invented by a Nazi concentration camp prisoner
